Plot: Detective Danny Fisher discovers his girlfriend has been kidnapped by a ex-con tied to Fisher's past, and he'll have to successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release.
Title: 12 Rounds
Actors: John Cena, Aidan Gillen, Ashley Scott, Steve Harris
tomatoConsensus: Energetic but empty, 12 Rounds' preposterous plot hurtles along at a rapid pace, but can't disguise the derivative script.
